name: Acorn Muffin
author: AcornGrill
summary: Through the creative process that is cooking, we came up with one of our fantastic creations we affectionately call the Acorn Muffin. This sweet and palate-cleansing treat is served with many of our flavorful meals (16 to be exact) at the Acorn Grill.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a muffin tin with cooking spray
Whisk sugar and butter together until sugar is mostly dissolved
Stir in baking powder, baking soda, and salt
Pour in flour slowly; make a small indent in the flour
Mix batter slightly and gradually pour in milk, mixing until just combined
Spoon batter into the muffin cups until 3/4 full
Bake in the center of the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into a muffin comes out clean, about 15 minutes
Cool in the tin for 5 minutes
Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
